abstract: Google said it completed its $3.1 billion takeover of DoubleClick, a merger that rivals such as Microsoft and Yahoo had fiercely opposed. It took Google nearly a year to close the hotly debated deal: The final obstacle fell away Tuesday when European regulators approved the transaction.
lead_paragraph: Google said it completed its $3.1 billion takeover of DoubleClick, a merger that rivals such as Microsoft and Yahoo had fiercely opposed. It took Google nearly a year to close the hotly debated deal: The final obstacle fell away Tuesday when European regulators approved the transaction.
